title: Interstellar Islands
description: After the third World War came the Final War. Two teenagers, Marlow and Zane, still remain in a bunker after watching the rest of their community pass on. Their redemption comes from a group of gatherers who claim to be representatives of the last surviving colony of humans.Despite the gatherer's questionable motives, Marlow and Zane have little choice but to go with them to the asteroid belt... to live in their Interstellar Islands.
author: Scott Boss
